backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining user profiles, challenge sessions, transactions, and access-controlled queries including leaderboard logic and competition state tracking.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature requests to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and functionality of all major frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global CSS defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode styles, and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx with a root mounting div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling authentication, backend actor connection, profile loading, page routing, and error states.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component showing copyright text with caffeine.ai attribution and icons.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar showing branding, navigation buttons, user info, and admin access based on profile and permissions.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for creating a user profile, handling first-user admin setup and username submission.
frontend/src/components/SendICPPrizeModa: Modal for sending ICP prizes, handling account input, amount validation, and transaction submission feedback.
frontend/src/components/SetAppPrincipalM: Empty or placeholder component file for setting the app principal.
frontend/src/config/appIdentity.ts: Utility functions to resolve the backend canister principal and derive its account identifier from environment variables.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, stored identities, and login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for calling backend methods like profiles, first-user flag, sessions, and mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining dark and light theme variables and base styling.
frontend/src/lib/accountId.ts: Implements ICP account ID generation using principal bytes, SHA-224 hashing, CRC32, and hex formatting.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity context providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin interface to manage competition state, view balances and transactions, and access app canister identity.
frontend/src/pages/LeaderboardPage.tsx: Displays the global leaderboard sorted by top XP scores with ranking visuals.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login screen using Internet Identity with feature highlights and a public top-players leaderboard.
frontend/src/pages/MainMenu.tsx: Main navigation menu linking to challenges, stats, wallet, and leaderboard pages.
frontend/src/pages/StatsPage.tsx: Shows user statistics including total XP, session history, and detailed challenge metrics.
frontend/src/pages/TypingChallenge.tsx: Implements a multi-level typing challenge with tracking of accuracy, WPM, XP, and session saving, using UI components and tooltips.
frontend/src/pages/WalletPage.tsx: Provides wallet UI for viewing balances, generating account IDs, and initiating ICP withdrawals with clipboard and dialog interactions.
frontend/src/types/index.ts: Defines shared TypeScript types, including the UserProfile interface matching the backend.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters for routing and admin token handling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration extending theme colors, animations, and container settings with plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing architecture, features, and known issues for the TypeFaster IC dapp.
